analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x8d88f0be6d21dd012bc04d8f073767ac33e33fc8.sol:
	Contract TheBitcoinCenterToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x8d88f0be6d21dd012bc04d8f073767ac33e33fc8.sol#212)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x8d88f0be6d21dd012bc04d8f073767ac33e33fc8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/25/0x8d88f0be6d21dd012bc04d8f073767ac33e33fc8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x8d88f0be6d21dd012bc04d8f073767ac33e33fc8.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
